formattedAddress: 1751 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1751 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Kramer is the best. At my first appointment, it was as if I’ve known her for years. She makes you feel comfortable and patiently explains everything. She answered all of my questions and then explained it all again to my wife over the phone, and even gave her advice, too. The receptionist is very friendly and nice. The nurse that took my blood was also great.

text.text: Dr. Kramer is the best. At my first appointment, it was as if I’ve known her for years. She makes you feel comfortable and patiently explains everything. She answered all of my questions and then explained it all again to my wife over the phone, and even gave her advice, too. The receptionist is very friendly and nice. The nurse that took my blood was also great.

originalText.text: Dr Rachel Kramer is the kindest, smartest , most thorough, caring doctor ! She researched and effectively linked ALL of my health issues together to give me an overall picture . She is friendly, open to questions, funny and engaging. I asked her a million questions and she patiently answered every one!! Staff is friendly, respectful and I was seen immediately. THANK you- I can’t say enough!

text.text: Dr Rachel Kramer is the kindest, smartest , most thorough, caring doctor ! She researched and effectively linked ALL of my health issues together to give me an overall picture . She is friendly, open to questions, funny and engaging. I asked her a million questions and she patiently answered every one!! Staff is friendly, respectful and I was seen immediately. THANK you- I can’t say enough!

originalText.text:
Dr. K is simply the most beautiful human being ever, her knowledge, expertise, bedside manner, her caring for patients, is simply outrageous.
she is very compassionate and gets involve in your medical problems as family. talking to her is already a therapy, she is full of patience, listens all your questions and patiently gives the answer that you need to hear for treating your medical condition.
the staff at midtown location is terrific, I love those ladies.
thank you Dr. K for been there for me, the best part is we discovered we are neighbors!!!

originalText.text: Simply put, Dr. Kramer is an absolutely fabulous physician and human being. I know her work as a patient and as a colleague. I have referred a number of patients to her, and her work is brilliant and thorough. Her staff is topnotch. There is no one I could recommend more highly, in any specialty!

text.text: Simply put, Dr. Kramer is an absolutely fabulous physician and human being. I know her work as a patient and as a colleague. I have referred a number of patients to her, and her work is brilliant and thorough. Her staff is topnotch. There is no one I could recommend more highly, in any specialty!

originalText.text: Dr Kramer is matter of fact, communicative, responsive and takes time to explore a condition. Asking questions after an appointment is super easy  and she removes the barriers to informed knowledge. I look forward to working with her over the months to come.
